sentences.en: A merry Christmas to all our readers.
sentences.cn: 祝我们所有的读者圣诞快乐。

sentences.en: A merry Xmas to all our readers!
He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.cn: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

sentences.en: He was much loved for his merry nature.
sentences.cn: 他快乐的天性很是招人喜欢。

sentences.en: He’s a lovely man with merry eyes and a wide smile.
sentences.cn: 他是个讨人喜欢的人，眼睛喜盈盈的，笑容满面。

sentences.en: I heard a peal of merry laughter.
sentences.cn: 我听到一阵响亮的欢笑声。

sentences.en: I just wanted to wish you a merry Christmas.
sentences.cn: 我只想祝福你圣诞快乐。

sentences.en: I was already merry after only two glasses of wine.
sentences.cn: 我只喝了两杯酒就有点醉了.

sentences.en: Merry black eyes glinted at them.
sentences.cn: 闪烁着喜悦光芒的黑眼睛注视着他们。

sentences.en: Neighbours approached their boundaries from opposite sides and made merry together.
sentences.cn: 邻居们从对面来到他们这边，一起尽情欢乐。

sentences.en: She turned away her face with a merry, ringing laugh.
sentences.cn: 她转过脸去,发出愉快清脆的笑声.

sentences.en: Slugs play merry hell with emerging shoots.
sentences.cn: 蛞蝓会破坏长出的新芽。

sentences.en: The phantom of the merry-go-round is just a local superstition.
sentences.cn: 旋转木马的幽灵只不过是当地的迷信说法。

sentences.en: They went off to Glengarriff to get merry.
sentences.cn: 他们到格伦加里夫去好好地喝上一杯。

phrases.tran_cn: 人（或物）越多越快乐，人（或物）越多越好

trans.tran_cn: 愉快的，快活的，有趣的，[口]微醉的，生动的
